<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LSV is still relatively new; this switch lets us turn it off in case we</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Remove this flag when we are confident with no regressions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53" lineLink="#a4647569730ae2f89447b647b6e8e0693"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;bool&gt;</a> <a href="#a4647569730ae2f89447b647b6e8e0693">DisableRequireStructuredCFG</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60" lineLink="#a521ca591601077c3291f35425f524968"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;bool&gt;</a> <a href="#a521ca591601077c3291f35425f524968">UseShortPointersOpt</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;nvptx-short-ptr&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cl/desc">cl::desc</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Use 32-bit pointers for accessing const/local/shared address spaces.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// byval arguments in NVPTX are special. We&#39;re only allowed to read from them</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// using a special instruction, and if we ever need to write to them or take an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// address, we must make a local copy and use it, instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The problem is that local copies are very expensive, and we create them very</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// late in the compilation pipeline, so LLVM does not have much of a chance to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// eliminate them, if they turn out to be unnecessary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// One way around that is to create such copies early on, and let them percolate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// through the optimizations. The copying itself will never trigger creation of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// another copy later on, as the reads are allowed. If LLVM can eliminate it,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it&#39;s a win. It the full optimization pipeline can&#39;t remove the copy, that&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as good as it gets in terms of the effort we could&#39;ve done, and it&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// certainly a much better effort than what we do now.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This early injection of the copies has potential to create undesireable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// side-effects, so it&#39;s disabled by default, for now, until it sees more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// testing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84" lineLink="#a78930cbb3e89d4c529177ae5e34832f3"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;bool&gt;</a> <a href="#a78930cbb3e89d4c529177ae5e34832f3">EarlyByValArgsCopy</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;nvptx-early-byval-copy&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cl/desc">cl::desc</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Create a copy of byval function arguments early.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109" lineLink="#aaed7e2473819aa12e64e58f5e9e8d79f"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">extern</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;C&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#adeb6f14d9f377993d79fae2efb34ecac">LLVM&#95;EXTERNAL&#95;VISIBILITY</a> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#aaed7e2473819aa12e64e58f5e9e8d79f">LLVMInitializeNVPTXTarget</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// EarlyCSE is not always strong enough to clean up what LSR produces. For</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// example, GVN can combine</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %0 = add %a, %b</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %1 = add %b, %a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %0 = shl nsw %a, 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %1 = shl %a, 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but EarlyCSE can do neither of them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetpassconfig/#a4c36a5c58e6e55c962d2d9bed0bb3ba7">getOptLevel</a>() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8ec1bf8d7b792ca9fac56f8514db18d2a6adf97f83acf6453d4a6a4b1070f3754">CodeGenOptLevel::None</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
